text:
@OliverDowden Not End of Story! Didn't follow the guidance, travelled 250 miles with #Covid19 symptoms. The guidelines are quite clear and repeated by @MattHancock and @BorisJohnson.
It is implicit to #StayHome self isolate and not travel. Flouting the rules is not acceptable. #ToryLies
